title: United Australia Party (2013)
summary: The United Australia Party (UAP), formerly known as Clive Palmer’s United Australia Party (Clive Palmer’s UAP) and the Palmer United Party (PUP), is an Australian political party formed by mining magnate Clive Palmer in April 2013. It was deregistered by the Australian Electoral Commission in 2017, but revived and re-registered in 2018. It brands itself as a revival of the original United Australia Party, which had been the main non-Labor federal party from 1931 to 1945.
